channel.title: Free [24/7 Host] and/or [Coder]
channel.description:
[ul]I can host your server and I can also code for it. I do however want 40% or more of the profit. I can also create and manage the website. I can also pay for a domain and website.
If you have any questions you can contact me with one of the following: MSN: [email]Oriks@live.com[/email] E-Mail: [email]JarenHalliday@Gmail.com[/email]
You can also just post here.
Computer specs:
[list] [li]Manufacturer:HP-Pavilion[/li] [li]Processor:Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU T5750 @ 2.00GHz (2 CPUs), ~2.0GHz[/li] [li]Memory:4086MB RAM[/li] [li]Hard Drive:307 GB[/li] [li]Video Card: Mobile Intel(R) 965 Express Chipset Family[/li] [li]Monitor:Generic PnP Monitor[/li] [li]Operating System:Windows Vista™ Home Premium (6.0, Build 6001) Service Pack 1 (6001.vistasp1_gdr.080425-1930)[/li][/list]
[URL=http://www.pingtest.net][IMG]http://www.pingtest.net/result/18965098.png[/img][/URL]
Coding experience: [list] [li]I know: C++, C#, HTML, CSS, PHP, VB.net, Java, and Perl[/li] [li]I have created 2 servers before.[/li] [/list] What I need from you: [list] [li]Dedication.[/li] [li]Ideas.[/li] [li]Support.[/li] [li]Be active.[/li] [li]Contact info.[/li] [li]Webclient.[/li] [/list][/ul]

item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Umm I know you’re not going to help me out with my server, however can you just take a quick look at this? Noone can seem to help me =[

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440962.0.html

Ahh I see now. You’re doing it for free but 40% of donations go to you. If there was ever a really big server you’d make quite a lot of money. I’d do it but we’re non-profitable. =s

Thanks again.

Read full topic

If you read the titel it says “Free” [24/7] Hosting. Not 40% [24/7] Hosting.

Wow, you saw that I was right so you go way off-topic?

It is free, I’m not charging anything. If I work and I’m paid only commission then I don’t get a weekly paycheck.

Just give me your MSN I can’t unblock you because I removed you from contact list because when people aren’t wanted they usually stay away and theres no reason to talk to them ever again. Damn you would be an annoying GF

item.title: Free [24/7 Host] and/or [Coder]
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

He didn’t technically steal it since you sent him the link… >_> not taking sides, just thought I’d point that out, my uncle’s a cop so…yeah.

It’s a scam and thats IF he downloaded which you should check to see how many times it was downloaded…

Anyways, you’re most likely not gonna find anyone who wants to give 40% profit? Especially when 90% of these servers are F2P. If you want to help code something I’m making a development team recoding and entire para based server to make it completely custom. But, its F2P not P2P especially because its not real RS…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,441005.0.html
